text.font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial

div.style: font-family: Inter, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial; font-size: 24px; line-height: 1.45; color:#cbd5e1;

foreignObject.div: A porcelain doll in a shadowy corridor, eerie and cinematic, center-framed in a low-angle composition with cold moonlight casting sharp shadows.
